QuestData.Title: Veehja's Revenge
QuestData.Description: We share a common enemy today, $r! My people have been wiped out by these Kvaldir... my city has been all but destroyed. It is time for exacting revenge!$B$BIn return for my help, I'd like you to slay the barbaric monsters that defile Riplash. You will be well rewarded, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Veehja at the Shrine of Scales wants you to slay 6 Skadir Mariners, 3 Skadir Mistweavers and 2 Skadir Runecasters.
